content:
i read these recently over flights to and from New Zealand: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cory_Doctorow#Martin_Hench_series

fun, and it's impressive just how exciting and interesting Cory Doctorow is able to make the world of "forensic accounting" :)
I finished the first book a while ago and really enjoyed it. Can't wait to start book 2 that's been sitting on my shelf for months now
I missed the Kickstarter for the 3rd one, so I've got to wait for it to be generally available in stores, etc
